entry.title: w00t! First CPAN upload of 2013!
entry.summary: According to metacpan.org, MooX-ClassAttribute-0.001 was the first upload of 2013! Yay!...
entry.content:
According to metacpan.org, MooX-ClassAttribute-0.001 was the first upload of 2013! Yay!

Yes, I did plan that. No, I didn't sit there and press the button. (sleep is a useful command-line tool.)

Meh... so now I notice I forgot to list the pre-requisites...
